Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-23650 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 24.0.9-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-23650 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 24.0.9-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-engine is earlier than 24.0.9-14, affected by CVE-2024-23650
